p: Dry biomass was analyzed gravimetrically. 1 mL of the culture broth was transferred into a pre-dried and pre-weighed reaction tube and centrifuged at 13,000 rpm for 5 min. The supernatant was collected and used for the determination of sugar and ammonia content. The cell pellet was washed with saline, dried at 60Â°C for 24 h and weighed.
